predicate.note: Frames file for 'vary' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entries 45.6, 45.4, both causatives and therefore very large classes. No Framenet entry. Comparison with fluctuate.

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Statistics on acquisitions by foreigners vary in detail, because unlike Sansui, which is listed on the Tokyo and Osaka stock exchanges, most of the Japanese companies acquired by foreigners are privately held .
example.arg: because unlike Sansui , which is listed on the Tokyo and Osaka stock exchanges , most of the Japanese companies acquired by foreigners are privately held

example.name: pseudopassive
example.text: But they said the C$30-a-share bid, which was due to expire Monday, may still be extended or varied.
example.arg: *trace* -> the C$ 30-a-share bid , which was due to expire Monday ,

example.name: agentive
example.text: Typically, momey-fund yields beat comparable short-term investments because portfolio managers can vary maturities and go after the highest rates.

example.name: high and low points
example.text: John's weight varies from 98 to 500 pounds.
